IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROTECT, AND TO PROMOTE AN APPRECIATION OF, THE NATURAL, AGRICULTURAL AND HISTORICAL RESOURCES OF THE PEE DEE WATERSHED OF SOUTH CAROLINA.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PROTECT, AND TO PROMOTE AN APPRECIATION OF THE SIGNIFICANT NATURAL, AGRICULTURAL AND HISTORICAL RESOURCES OF THE PEE DEE WATERSHED OF SOUTH CAROLINA.
IRS990.Desc: IN 2022-2023, PEE DEE LAND TRUST MAINTAINED ITS MEMBERSHIP BASE ANDOVERALL GIVING WAS SOLID. PDLT CONSERVED AN ADDITIONAL 1,834.32 ACRESUNDER CONSERVATION EASEMENTS. THE EASEMENTS CONSERVE RURAL OPEN SPACEVIEWS, WATER QUALITY AND NATURAL HABITATS IN THE PEE DEE RIVER BASINS,AND PRIME SOILS AND SOILS OF STATEWIDE IMPORTANCE FOR AGRICULTURE.MOST OF THE EASEMENTS ARE IN CLOSE PROXIMITY TO OTHER PROTECTEDPROPERTIES. AS OF JUNE 30, 2023, PEE DEE LAND TRUST COMPLETEDMONITORING OF 50% (OF 2023 CALENDAR YEAR MONITORING) OF ITS EASEMENTS.NO EASEMENTS HAVE BEEN EXTINGUISHED OR AMENDED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PEE DEE LAND TRUST (PDLT) DID ENGAGE IN MINIMAL GRASSROOTS LOBBYING BY ASKING BOARD MEMBERS TO CONSIDER CALLING LEGISLATORS AND CONGRESSMEN ABOUT LAND CONSERVATION BILLS BILL AT THE FEDERAL LEVEL AND CONSERVATION BANK FUNDING AT THE STATE LEVEL. PAID STAFF ALSO VISITED STATE LEGISLATORS AND WROTE TO CONGRESSMEN RELATING TO CONSERVATION BANK FUNDING AND CONSERVATION LEGISLATION AT THE STATE LEVEL. PDLT INCURRED MINIMAL LOBBYING EXPENSES FOR FY 2022-2023 ESTIMATED TO BE $220.

PEE DEE LAND TRUST (PDLT) IS COMMITTED TO PROTECTING THE CONSERVATION PURPOSES OF EACH CONSERVATION EASEMENT WHICH IT HOLDS. PDLT CONDUCTS ANNUAL MONITORING INSPECTIONS OF EVERY PROPERTY ON WHICH IT HOLDS A CONSERVATION EASEMENT. SUCH INSPECTIONS ARE DOCUMENTED IN MONITORING REPORTS ASSOCIATED WITH EACH PROTECTED PROPERTY. THIS PRACTICE IS OUTLINED IN THE "MONITORING POLICY" OF THE PDLT. THE RIGHT TO MONITOR/INSPECT PROPERTY ON WHICH THE PDLT HOLDS A CONSERVATION EASEMENT IS ADDRESSED IN THE CONSERVATION EASEMENT DOCUMENT. THIS DOCUMENT GRANTS PDLT THE RIGHT OF VISUAL ACCESS, RIGHT TO MONITOR, RIGHT TO PREVENT INCONSISTENT USES, RIGHT TO REQUIRE RESTORATION, AND ADDITIONAL REMEDIES. PDLT HAS A WRITTEN "EASEMENT VIOLATION RESOLUTION POLICY" WHICH ESTABLISHES A PROCEDURE FOR ADDRESSING VIOLATIONS OF CONSERVATION EASEMENTS. CONSERVATION EASEMENTS HAVE NO STATED VALUE AND THEREFORE, THE ESTIMATED VALUE OF EASEMENTS IS NOT RECORDED ON THE FINANCIAL STATEMENT BECAUSE THE EASEMENTS DO NOT REPRESENT A FUTURE ECONOMIC BENEFIT TO THE ORGANIZATION.

THE ORGANIZATION IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AND THEREFORE HAS MADE NO PROVISION FOR FEDERAL INCOME TAXES IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. IN ADDITION, THE ORGANIZATION HAS BEEN DETERMINED BY THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE NOT TO BE A "PRIVATE FOUNDATION" WITHIN THE MEANING OF SECTION 509(A) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE. THE ORGANIZATION INCURRED NO UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME FOR THE YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2023. THE ORGANIZATION FILES INCOME TAX RETURNS IN THE U.S. FEDERAL JURISDICTION. THE ORGANIZATION IS NO LONGER SUBJECT TO U.S. FEDERAL, STATE AND LOCAL TAX EXAMINATIONS BY TAX AUTHORITIES FOR YEARS BEFORE 2016. BECAUSE THE ORGANIZATION IS EXEMPT FROM TAXATION UNDER INTERNAL REVENUE CODE 501(C)(3), THE ORGANIZATION IS GENERALLY NOT EXPOSED TO INTEREST AND PENALTIES RELATED TO INCOME TAXES. WHEN APPLICABLE, THE ORGANIZATION RECOGNIZES INTEREST AND PENALTIES PAID RELATED TO TAX OBLIGATIONS AND BENEFITS IN MANAGEMENT AND GENERAL EXPENSES.

IN FISCAL YEAR 2022-2023, THE PEE DEE LAND TRUST RECEIVED 5 QUALIFYING CONSERVATION EASEMENT DONATIONS. CONSERVATION EASEMENTS HAVE NO STATED VALUE AND THEREFORE, ARE NOT RECORDED ON THE BOOKS OF THE PEE DEE LAND TRUST. THE ESTIMATED VALUE OF EASEMENTS IS NOT RECORDED ON THE FINANCIAL STATEMENT BECAUSE THE EASEMENTS DO NOT REPRESENT A FUTURE ECONOMIC BENEFIT TO THE ORGANIZATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH BOARD MEMBER OF PEE DEE LAND TRUST (PDLT) RECEIVES A COPY OF THE 990 BY EMAIL FOR THEM TO REVIEW. THE FINANCE COMMITTEE WILL REVIEW THE COPY OF THE 990 AND PUT FORTH A MOTION FOR APPROVAL AT THE DECEMBER BOARD OF DIRECTORS MEETING. ONCE THE BOARD APPROVES THE RETURN WILL BE FILED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH DIRECTOR, PRINCIPAL OFFICER AND MEMBER OF THE COMMITTEE OF PEE DEE LAND TRUST (PDLT) WITH GOVERNING BOARD DELEGATED POWERS SHALL ANNUALLY RECEIVE A COPY OF THE CONFLICTS OF INTEREST POLICY. MEMBERS ARE REQUIRED TO DISCLOSE ANY POSSIBLE CONFLICT OF INTEREST AND IF A CONFLICT OF INTEREST IS DETERMINED THEN THE GOVERNING BOARD SHALL APPOINT A DISINTERESTED PERSON TO INVESTIGATE ALTERNATIVES TO THE PROPOSED TRANSACTION. IF AN EQUALLY ADVANTAGEOUS TRANSACTION OR ARRANGEMENT IS NOT REASONABLY POSSIBLE NOT PRODUCING A CONFLICT OF INTEREST, THE BOARD MAY DETERMINE TO PROCEED. HOWEVER, THE CONFLICTED PARTY MAY NOT BE PRESENT DURING DISCUSSION UNLESS TO PROVIDE INFORMATION AND MUST BE ABSENT FROM A VOTE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF PEE DEE LAND TRUST (PDLT) REVIEWS AND APPROVES THE COMPENSATION OF THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST AT THE OFFICE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PEE DEE LAND TRUST (PDLT) HONORS THE REQUIREMENTS OF THE LAWS GOVERNING REQUESTS FOR SUCH DOCUMENTS FROM THE PUBLIC AND FEDERAL AND STATE AGENCIES.
PEE DEE LAND TRUST (PDLT) HAS A FINANCE COMMITTEE WHICH ASSUMES RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE OVERSITE OF THE COMPILATION OF THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.
